amendment.description: To require reports on the efforts of the President to stabilize Iraq and relieve the burden on members of the Armed Forces of the United States deployed in Iraq and the Persian Gulf region.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3377 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 138.

action.text: Amendment SA 3377 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S7140-7143, S7152-7160) To require reports on the efforts of the President to stabilize Iraq and relieve the burden on members of the Armed Forces of the United States deployed in Iraq and the Persian Gulf region.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3377 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 138.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3377 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 138.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3377 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
